thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 11 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Hubei Biocause Pharmaceutical's Preliminary 2017 Net Profit Down, Sees Q1 Net Profit Rising

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Hubei Biocause Pharmaceutical's Preliminary 2017 Net Profit Down, Sees Q1 Net Profit Rising

organizations.name: reuters) - hubei biocause pharmaceutical co ltd

text:
April 11 (Reuters) - Hubei Biocause Pharmaceutical Co Ltd :
* SAYS PRELIM 2017 NET PROFIT DOWN 21.9 PERCENT AT 1.4 BILLION YUAN ($222.79 million)
* SAYS IT SEES Q1 NET PROFIT TO RISE 172.7-218.2 PCT Y/Y VS 110 MLN YUAN YEAR AGO
* SAYS INSURANCE UNIT'S Q1 PREMIUM INCOME TOTALLED 27.15 BILLION YUAN Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2v63iKP ; bit.ly/2qpjEJ7 ; bit.ly/2IIAFFE Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.2840 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
